department: Transportation Research and Injury Prevention Centre
name: TRV75X Net Zero Transportation
description: Basics of net zero transportation, transport sector and carbon emissions, emissions from various modes of transport (goods and passenger vehicles); Decarbonizing the transportation sector (low-or zero-carbon modes – electric vehicles, active travel, solutions and non-motorized vehicle); Clean fuels, technology, vehicle efficiency, modal optimization, alternative energy strategies and transport behaviour to achieve net-Zero carbon emissions; Regulations, green business, and transportation policies for economic development and environmental sustainability.
